Prerequisite: Ranger, Adamant Arrow Student feat

Benefit: When you are attacking with a greatbow or a longbow and you have proficiency with that weapon, you gain the following two benefits.

When you hit an enemy and at least one other enemy is providing it with cover from your attack, you deal damage equal to your Dexterity modifier to one enemy providing cover to it.

You can use a power associated with this feat in place of a ranged basic attack.

Associated Powers:

Blow-Through Assault: (Only when used as a ranged attack)

Hammer Shot

,

Hunter's Shot

,

Knockdown Shot

,

Thwarting Shot

Published in Martial Power 2, page(s) 110.
